src:
蘿蔔糕做法 外脆內軟（視頻）

06 Nov 2019, 11:18

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月06日訊】蘿蔔糕做法
Turnip Cake Recipe蘿蔔糕食譜?Ingredient材料:Dried shrimps 15g蝦米15克Daikon 300g白蘿蔔300克Wheat flour 20g澄粉20克Tapioca flour 20g木薯粉20克Rice flour 200g粘米粉200克Water 500ml清水500毫升Cooking oil 1tbsp食油1湯匙Garlic 1tbsp蒜米1湯匙Water 200ml清水200毫升Salt 1.5tsp鹽1.5茶匙Caster sugar 2tsp細砂糖2茶匙Pepper half tsp胡椒粉半茶匙Light soy sauce 1tbsp生抽1湯匙Sesame oil 1tsp芝麻油1茶匙
以下YouTube視頻示範：



（責任編輯：張信燕） 本文網址: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/06/a102701081.html
text:
Turnip cake practice, crispy and soft inside (video)

06 Nov 2019, 11:18

[New Tang Dynasty Beijing time, November 06, 2019] radish cake practice
Turnip Cake Recipe Radish Cake Recipe? Ingredient Material: Dried shrimps 15g Shrimp 15g Daikon 300g White Radish 300g Wheat flour 20g Chengfen 20g Tapioca flour 20g Tapioca Powder 20g Rice flour 200g Sticky Rice Powder 200g Water 500ml Clear Water 500ml Cooking oil 1tbsp cooking oil 1 tablespoon Garlic 1tbsp garlic 1 tablespoon Water 200ml water 200 ml Salt 1.5tsp salt 1.5 teaspoons Caster sugar 2tsp fine sugar 2 teaspoons Pepper half tsp pepper powder half teaspoon Light soy sauce 1tbsp soy sauce 1 tablespoon Sesame oil 1tsp sesame oil 1 teaspoon
The following YouTube video demo:



(Editor: Zhang Xinyan) This article URL: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/06/a102701081.html
